description: Kurt Marshall introduces the mystery skier to his five friends-Scott O'Hara, Tony Bravo, Chris Lance, Jeff Converse and Giorgio Canali-and  and soon Scott O'Hara (The Man with the Biggest Dick in San Francisco!) strips down and the orgy action begins. O'Hara's cock gets plenty of action in this legendary orgy...featuring a 'foot-fucking' by Giorgio Canali.
series: The Other Side Of Aspen II
title: The Other Side Of Aspen II, Scene #06
